lore: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he sought a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with slow, excruciating inventiveness. His victims suffer far beyond their brief mortal coil as Thresh wreaks agony upon their souls, imprisoning them in his unholy lantern to torture for all eternity.
title: the Chain Warden
blurb: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he sought a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with slow...
allytips: Communication is key when making use of Thresh's lantern. Let your teammates know how you like to use it.
Death Sentence and Flay can be combined in either cast order for powerful combinations.
Thresh can collect souls without needing to kill units himself. Planning your map position to be near the most deaths will help to maximize soul collection.

passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

enemytips: Thresh's Death Sentence has a long cast time. Watch for the cast to begin to take evasive actions.
Intentionally breaking a wall of The Box can allow a vulnerable ally to escape unscathed.
Thresh relies on collecting souls for a portion of his defense and damage. Try punishing him when he moves to collect them.
name: Thresh

spells.name: Death Sentence
spells.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds. Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy. Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him. The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

spells.name: Flay
spells.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage). Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second. Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

spells.name: The Box
spells.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.sanitizedDescription: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall. Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
